item.description: Learn the ins and outs of the Local Channel including different ways to tweak it to work more efficiently

item.description: Cut back on your work with common channels. Create a timelime that appears throughout all timelines

item.description: Setup the timelines in a sequential order so you may have flexible control on what plays and in which order

item.label: Timeline Scheduler
item.description: Scheduler allows you to create a scheduled programming guide for your timelines

item.label: Desktop Player
item.description: Learn the difference between WEBPlayer and AIRPlayer. How to install and how to use your Digital Signage Players

item.label: Embedded Player
item.description: Use the SignagePlayer embedded version to embed a full Digital Signage or interactive Kiosk right onto a web site. Create dynamic banners, all synced with your SignagePlayer Desktop players.

item.label: FireFox
item.description: Video tutorial demonstrates how to use FireFox to embed a Web Browser inside a screen division (Windows/Ubuntu OS)

item.label: VLC
item.description: Video LAN (VLC) is a very powerful Media Player that can play almost any file format as well as stream content. Learn how to embed it inside a screen division (Windows/Ubuntu OS)

item.description: Add PowerPoint slides directly to a screen division. Take advantage of technologies you are familiar with to enrich your presentation

item.label: Transition effect
item.description: Setup special effects

item.description: Setup a Video wall

item.label: Power Savings
item.description: Go Green. Save energy by turning the SignagePlayer physically On and OFF everyday of the week

item.label: Server connections
item.description: Learn about how server connections are done

item.label: Linux Installation
item.description: Learn how to install the SignagePlayer on Linux Ubuntu 9.04. Step by step instructions on how to install and configure the SignagePlayer

item.label: Mac Installation
item.description: Learn how to install the SignagePlayer on a Mac

item.label: Offline Updater (SneakerNet)
item.description: The tutorial demonstrates how to manually update a remote station that does not have internet connectivity. This is accomplished by exporting all data to a Flash drive and importing it onto the SignagePlayer

item.label: Kiosk
item.description: Build a powerful Kiosk system using our Digital Signage platform. Download a working example from http://master.signage.me/MasterServer/Samples/Kiosk/RestaurantModule.zip

item.label: Multi Output
item.description: Connect multiple AIRPlayers to a single timeline while combining shared and unique channels among these AIRPlayers

item.label: Interrupt mode
item.description: Run the signage presentation like a screen save so it kicks in only when no user interaction exists. Great for POS and other system integration.

item.label: Music Player
item.description: The music player is an integrated part of the AIRPlayer and it allows you to run your own custom music playlists as background music. You can control the music selection remotely

item.label: Video Conversion
item.description: Learn how to convert none compatible video formats to a compatible ones using a freeware utility
